name: Commune (W3SS3L)
description:
This project was made for the International Game Jam 2022

jump around, use pollen to send signals, and reverse gravity in this cute plant and tech platformer!

Controls:

Move: arrow keys or WASD

jump: spacebar

signal: left mouse button

gravity shift: 1

Credits:

Developers:

Ginn Korngold

Jessica Ceder

Artists:

Wessel van Montfoort

Madeleine Åkerström

Rami Al Yasin

Rick Spliethof
